summary: Teaches the move Facade, a Normal-type physical attack (70 power) that doubles in power (140) if the user is poisoned, paralyzed, or burned, ignoring the Attack drop from burn.
typical_users: Physical attackers leveraging status conditions (e.g., Guts users like Ursaluna, Heracross), setup sweepers with Flame Orb (e.g., Dragonite), or any Pokémon needing a reliable, condition-boosted STAB or coverage move.
